title: PBE register same as Alpha?
body: If i get added into the PBE will i get a notification from my email and live server client just like alpha? and yes i am an alpha member, i just really want to be a member in PBE.

replies.body:
If you get accepted into the PBE, you won't get a live notification in-game, but you will get an email to the address associated with your live account. 

For a complete rundown on the PBE, check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
